Introduction

Yurim is a South Korean singer under GH Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group 3YE and the co-ed project group Triple7.

Urim originally debuted as a member of Apple.B on August 1, 2017, with the group's first digital single "Woochuchu." However, the group disbanded in 2018. She made her second debut on May 21, 2019, as a member of 3YE with their first digital single "DMT."

On August 10, 2021, Urim debuted as part of the project group Triple7, with the digital single "Presente." Triple7 is a collaboration between members of 3YE and B.I.G.
